How do you remove GRUB from An MRB?: to remove grub, normally you replace it with something that's not grub; lilo, or fdisk /mbr from dos, or install Windows
to remove grub, normally you overwrite it with something that's not grub; lilo, or fdisk /mbr from dos, or install Windows
dd if=/dev/zero of=/dev/hda bs=512 count=1 will 'remove' grub for you..
